pageContext.claim: “If they thought there was something with Russia, and I’m one of two people that are gonna be the president of the United States, they should have come to me and said, 'Sir, you’re dealing with people that may have something to do with Russia. We want to let you know.' And I’d say, 'I’m sorry whoever it may be, you gotta go, sorry.'”
pageContext.analysis: As soon as Paul Manafort was hired by Trump, there were numerous article about his shady dealings Ukraine and Russia. On April 13, 2016, Bloomberg columnist Eli Lake even wrote an article titled, "Trump Just Hired His Next Scandal."
